Package edu.qut.cab302.wehab.controllers.main

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
edu.qut.cab302.wehab.controllers.main.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
Main controller for managing application views and user interactions.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainController

      public MainController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up key event handling for the password field. Logs the user in when the ENTER key is pressed.

    • onGoToRegisterScreen

      protected void onGoToRegisterScreen()
      Navigates to the registration screen when the user clicks the "Create account" button.

    • backToLoginScreen

      protected void backToLoginScreen()
      Navigates back to the login screen.

    • onRegisterClick

      protected void onRegisterClick()
      Handles user registration when the "Register" button is clicked. Validates input fields and creates a new user account if validation passes.

    • onLoginClick

      protected void onLoginClick()
      Handles user login when the "Login" button is clicked. Validates input fields and authenticates the user.
